title: How Biden’s staff picks could shape Tech policy
description:
As president-elect Joe Biden selects his staff, Big Tech allies and reformers are starting to battle over who will be shaping the tech industry. Teddy Schleifer explains why the Biden Administration could look like it did under Obama and why it might be different.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Who will have a seat at the table?
